title: Result of CB OMO to fight inflation

content.question: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, which of the following is most likely to occur if the central bank engages in open market operations to reduce inflation?

choices.label: A decrease in reserves in the banking system
A decrease in the government deficit
An increase in the money supply

content.answer: A decrease in reserves in the banking system

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
